name: SS Clio
author: Kimon Papadimitriou
body:
Historie

Clio SS was a Greek cargo steamer that was wrecked on the 19th January 1904 on the Egripo Channel when on route from Piraeus for Volos with a general cargo.

Read more at wrecksite: https://www.wrecksite.eu/wreck.aspx?154818

Beschrijving

References

  • WRECKSITE - CLIO PASSENGER/CARGO SHIP 1870-1904 [WWW Document], n.d. URL https://www.wrecksite.eu/wreck.aspx?154818 (accessed 4.10.24)
  • GrafasDIVING - Shipwreck CLIO [WWW Document], n.d. URL https://www.grafasdiving.gr/en/shipwrecks/clio/ (accessed 4.10.24)
Vermogen96 pk
Snelheid8 knopen ~ 15 km/u (9 mijl per uur)
Lengte190 ½ voet (58,1 m)
Breedte26 ¼ voet (8 m)
Diepgang12 ¾ voet (3,9 m)
Tonnage481 ton

Status

The shipwreck was designated as a monument in 2024, according to the Law 4858/2021 (https://diavgeia.gov.gr/doc/65%CE%A4%CE%9946%CE%9D%CE%9A%CE%9F%CE%A4-5%CE%A8%CE%A0?inline=true).
